badEnding.text: In the end, everything has ended up the same. Can't say I haven't tried it.
I suppose it's already too late. You've wasted the opportunity I've given to you.
Alex and Anna will continue making life impossible to other classmates. You haven't been their first victim, nor the last one.
Is it too hard asking for help when needed? Forget your ego. You're not always to blame for what happens to you, nor do you deserve it.
Why that fear of sharing what is going on with yourself, what do you feel?
Why do we let people suffer? Why do we think it's better to remain silent? To let time heals everything?
It's easy to make fun of others, but what happens when the one affected is you?
Why is it better to suffer or see others having a bad time than asking for help? Is it asking for help or preventing someone from having a rough time snitching?

normalEnding.text: It seems that I haven't reached my purpose at the end, but at least things have improved a little.
Alex will be watched from now on and will at least leave you all in peace a little.
You must ask for help when you need. Forget your ego. You're not always to blame for what happens to you, nor do you deserve it.
Time isn't gonna fix things if you suffer. You mustn't let it go.
We all need help once in a while, and at least I hope you're now aware that, as there are people who help you, others need you to help them too.
Maybe is it better to suffer or see others suffer than asking for help? Is it asking for help or preventing someone from having a rough time snitching?
I hope that, with what you have gone through, you lose that fear of telling the bad things that happen to to you and your classmates.

goodEnding.text: Good, we've managed to change things.
You don't know it yet, but we've managed to Alex stop bullying his classmates and you.
If no one had stopped him, you wouldn't have been the last person to suffer his bullying.
It's good to speak up and ask for help. No one deserves what you've dealt with, no matter the reason.
There will be people saying you snitch to your professor, to your classmates or to your parents. I think you've been a hero.
I hope you never stay silent again if someone needs help or is suffering. You should show them your support instead of following the bully.
It's easy to do nothing, but has it crossed your mind that you can be his next victim, just like what happened now...?

playerQuestion.text: Cut the crap and go away.

curiousAnswer.text: I'm afraid I can't tell you that.
Think of me as someone who is CONNECTED to you by all the things we have in common.
But it doesn't matter who I am. What matters is that what you've gone through made you think and be a better person.

unpoliteAnswer.text: I'm sorry my presence doesn't make you comfortable.
And maybe this wasn't worth at all...
